2019300.name: Dokimon: Quest
2019300.description:
Drown in nostalgia and go on an adventure in search of your missing childhood friend.

Dokimon: Quest is a game where you capture monsters to battle alongside and push through the dangerous open world. In advances to uncover the the mystery about your missing friend, you must become stronger, allowing you to venture on into increasingly dangerous areas.

Dokimon: Quest is a turn-based monster tamer game, with modern day QoL:

  • Speed up battles by holding an action key

  • Edit monster stats and move pools from your main menu (when in towns)

  • Battle helper tips and tools (optional)

  • Quest log, to help you keep track of your journey

  • 8bit + Piano OST, pick which one suits your preference

  • World battles lets you battle right in your surroundings (enable in options)

  • 20+ Retro Color palettes, in case full color isn't your style

  • 9 Playable characters to choose from

  • 4 Save files, in case your friends want to try

Features

Battle against Rangers who are also on the quest to get stronger, and take down evil corporations that stand in your way and disrupt the peace.

Dokimon takes inspiration from the "GameBoy Color" era of games, without the chunkiness of some of those old systems. (Like, the game's systems.. not the consoles, we love those).

On your adventures, you'll be able to:

  • Collect over 140 unique, original monsters

  • Go on an adventure expanding across 15+ towns

  • Explore several routes, caves, shrines, seas, and mountains

  • Complete a 15-20 hour story mode, and endless fun for completionists

  • Track down rare monsters to unlock the game's post story

  • Experience 7 alt-palettes for each monster (1 of which is incredibly rare)

  • Go FISHING!

Built to last. Dokimon: Quest was developed in the MonMae engine (aka Luna)

Dokimon: Quest was made in MonTamer Maker (MonMae, also know as Luna), which is platform/engine that was made specifically for making monster tamer games.

This engine continues to grow in it's uses and features thanks to the devs and helpful community. Therefore, the making of new Dokimon: Quest (and similar) titles is within arms reach, even for you!

Professor Intro

"Watch out!" "You almost just got singed by a Burnsby!! Didn't you know? They may be cute and cuddly, but they hide amongst plush animals, and strike out at unsuspecting prey. Their cute demeanor can quickly send you on a trip to the hospital!"

Professor Rei: "Oh, hey! I didn't see you there. I was practicing my lines for.. Err, Nevermind.."

"My name is Rei! I've sort of made a name for myself as a Dokimon specialist. Ever since the Great Divide, I've made it my mission to thoroughly document Dokimon on Earth. Dokimon are extremely dangerous creatures, so studying them profusely helps to ensure everyone's safety. You probably already knew that, though.."

"But anyway, what are you still doing here? Go play the game already!"

There is a Dokimon Wiki that includes information about all monsters, tips, guides, and more. To those that are interested, please check the Dokimon: Quest Steam Community Hub, or try googling "Dokimon Wiki".
2019300.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
